Package lab3_1

Class Tool

java.lang.Object
lab3_1.Tool
public class Tool
extends java.lang.Object
Represent a tool item and keeps track of its id, name, quantity in stock, price, and supplier id.
Since:
October 13, 2020
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tong Xu
